c74object.name: lsq.translator
c74object.digest: A Lindenmayer System string processor that translates 1-dimensional strings to Jitter matrix cell contents.
c74object.description: Translate Lindenmayer System (L-System) strings into 2-dimentional, 2-plane [jit.matrix] data. The translator interprets the l-sequencer branching symbols so they will be create new rows.

method.name: l-string
method.digest: The L-system string that will be translated into Jitter matrix cell entries.
method.description: The L-system string that will be translated into Jitter matrix cell entries. Cell output will be successive 4 item lists of integers: {cell-value} {cell-column} {cell-row} {plane}. See the [lsq.translator] Max help file for the integer semantics.
